                    Context: 
                    This chunk appears within the "Library Index" section of the Erowid website, specifically under resources related to books and literature about psychoactive substances. It provides links to books by author and subject, access to notable online books such as PiHKAL and TiHKAL, Shulgin's Lab Books, and other reference materials. It also includes general site information, support and donation options, Erowid's newsletter, and a shopping section for related Erowid merchandise.
